alert.note: Alert for Cass; Otoe; Sarpy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Fremont, northwestern Montgomery, Mills, eastern Pottawattamie, northeastern Sarpy, northeastern Otoe and eastern Cass Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles east of Hancock to 2 miles northeast of Nehawka. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oakland around 245 PM CDT. Sidney around 300 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 4 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
